headline: Deficits are 'greatest threat' to US economy: Fifth Third Bank CEO
summary: President Trump has tapped former Fed Governor Kevin Warsh to be the next chair of the Federal Reserve, announcing his nomination last week. Fifth Third Bancorp (FITB) Chairman and CEO Tim Spence outlines what Jerome Powell's potential Fed replacement should be focusing on and the areas that present the "greatest threat" to the US economy. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
